solution_line_template: The mom dog eats {mom_cups_per_meal} cups of food * {mom_meals_per_day} = <<{mom_cups_per_meal}*{mom_meals_per_day}={mom_cups_per_day}>>{mom_cups_per_day} cups per day.
For {num_days} days the mom dog will need {num_days} * {mom_cups_per_day} cups = <<{num_days}*{mom_cups_per_day}={mom_total_cups}>>{mom_total_cups} cups of food.
The puppies eat {puppy_cups_per_meal} cup of food * {puppy_meals_per_day} = <<{puppy_cups_per_meal}*{puppy_meals_per_day}={puppy_cups_per_day}>>{puppy_cups_per_day} cup per day.
There are {num_puppies} puppies * {puppy_cups_per_day} cup = <<{num_puppies}*{puppy_cups_per_day}={puppies_total_cups_per_day}>>{puppies_total_cups_per_day} cups per day for the puppies.
For the {num_days} days, the puppies will need {puppies_total_cups_per_day} cups * {num_days} = <<{puppies_total_cups_per_day}*{num_days}={puppies_total_cups}>>{puppies_total_cups} cups of food.
Combined the dogs will need {mom_total_cups} cups + {puppies_total_cups} cups = <<{mom_total_cups}+{puppies_total_cups}={total_cups}>>{total_cups} cups.
